latestPosts.caption:
Chasing your dreams requires passion, hard work and the right support system. Just like I’ve had my constants, my incredible team, by my side over the years, @bloomhotels has been our go-to when we we’re on the road, helping us be at our creative best, ready to take on every audition, every meeting and make the magic happen.

#BloomToYourBest #Actor #Entrepreneur #Producer

Watch Rahul Dravid a #BloomerLegend who exemplifies outstanding performance anchored in courage combined with integrity. 

He represents the best of India both as a player and as a person exuding brilliance with understated class. 

He carried the weight of a billion people’s expectations on his shoulders and stepped up with unflinching conviction for his country.

Despite overwhelming odds he was committed to always delivering despite the pressure …. every single time.

In this same way, Bloom takes inspiration from Rahul in consistently taking care of our loyal guests when they’re traveling away from home with a clean and crisp experience you can rely on …. Every Single Time.

#RahulDravid #RahulDravidisaBloomer #bloom
